member.name: M:ApiDPSystem.Controllers.FileController.GetFileWithCarsByFilterInfo(ApiDPSystem.Models.Filter)
member.summary: Create file with cars info for certain dealer by any condition FileFormat: 0,1 - json | 2 - xml | 3 - yaml | 4 - csv Category: 0,1 - all | 2 - sold | 3 - actual
member.param: Category: 0 - all cars for dealer 1 - all filters 2 - only sold cars 3 - only actual cars Dealer Name
